Label.en: I feel you are trying to get closer to someone
Label.fr: I feel you are trying to get closer to someone
Label.es: I feel you are trying to get closer to someone

Label.en: But you don't really know how to
Label.fr: But you don't really know how to
Label.es: But you don't really know how to

Label.en: I feel you are the kind of person that is more likely to show love with hugs than flowers, and that must be why you are in this situation : sometimes also like flowers. I hope you see what I mean ...
Label.fr: I feel you are the kind of person that is more likely to show love with hugs than flowers, and that must be why you are in this situation : sometimes also like flowers. I hope you see what I mean ...

Label.en: I am pretty sure about it though. Unless ... I am not seeing your present but your future
Label.fr: I am pretty sure about it though. Unless ... I am not seeing your present but your future
Label.es: I am pretty sure about it though. Unless ... I am not seeing your present but your future

Label.en: I can see that you will be trying to show your love with hugs rather than flowers, except that approach may not work for you. I would suggest you think about it when the times come.
Label.fr: I can see that you will be trying to show your love with hugs rather than flowers, except that approach may not work for you. I would suggest you think about it when the times come.
